snippet: Mitt Romney describes his brushes with near joblessness, but the campaign can't provide more information.
abstract: Mitt Romney describes his brushes with near joblessness, but the campaign can't provide more information.
lead_paragraph: ROCHESTER, N.H. - Mitt Romney told a New Hampshire crowd on Sunday afternoon that he knew what it was like to fear a pink slip - but so far, his campaign has not been able to provide any examples of a time when Mr. Romney, the former governor of Massachusetts who spent more than two decades in the private sector, truly feared for his job.

headline.main: Romney's Fear of Firing, Minus the Details
